job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Staffing and Recruiting
job.description: <p>An award winning, Austin based organization are looking for a Principal Machine Learning Engineer join their growing team of experienced Data professionals. The company offer a talent platform that helps companies to be matched with skilled workers. The right candidate is likely to have 3+ years' commercial experience as well as a strong academic background from a top University.</p><p><br></p><p>Required skills &amp; experience:</p><ul><li><strong>Educated to Bachelors degree in Computer Science (Essential) (Top 50 University)</strong></li><li>3+ years' commercial experience in ML or Data Science position</li><li>Extensive Machine Learning experience</li><li>Experience with Big Data technologies</li><li>Programming: Python, SQL, Scala, Java</li></ul><p><br></p><p>The client is not currently in a position to sponsor or transfer visa's, so please only apply if you have full rights to work in the US without restriction.</p>
